title: Proposed Parliamentary Programme for the Appropriation Bill for the Year 2015
decision_details:
- Cabinet noted the above Parliamentary Programme which will be as follows: 
		
		*	Budget Speech		-  2014?10?24

		*	Second Reading Debate  	-  from 2014?10?25 to 2014?11?01
			(seven allotted days)

		*	Committee Stage Debate	-  from 2014?11?03 to 2014?11?24
			(seventeen allotted days)
